name: Pizza Boy (automatonvx)
description:
Pizza Boy is a pizza delivery driver simulator made for Ludum Dare 51 - Every 10 Seconds

Your a fresh new recruit, you managed to get enough money together for your own wheels, now its time to put it to work and rack up some cash. They say a good pizza delivery boy should be able to make a delivery every 10 seconds, but as your new we'll settle for every 20. Good luck.

Controls

WASD or gamepad controller (A to accelerate B to brake) Left Stick to Steer.

Pickup the Pizza (flavours Fish, Tomato, Chicken) Green Icons in the main view and deliver it to the correct request (correct flavour) Yellow Icons in main view. On the minimap Pickup and Drop off Icons look the same (sorry about that). 

Each day you have to deliver the required number of pizzas within the required average time to progress to the next day. Make it through all 5 progressively harder days to complete the game
